articles.title: Druzhba pipeline leak reduces Russian oil flows to Germany - Reuters
articles.description: Germany said on Wednesday it was receiving less oil but still had adequate supplies, after Poland found a leak in the Druzhba pipeline that delivers crude from Russia to Europe that Warsaw said was probably caused by an accident rather than sabotage.
articles.content: WARSAW, Oct 12 (Reuters) - Germany said on Wednesday it was receiving less oil but still had adequate supplies, after Poland found a leak in the Druzhba pipeline that delivers crude from Russia to Eu… [+4787 chars]

articles.title: NATO's defence ministers confront Ukraine challenges, desire for air defence systems - CBC.ca
articles.description: NATO defence ministers, including Canada's Anita Anand, met Wednesday as the alliance's member countries face the twin challenges of supplying weapons to Ukraine while shoring up European energy independence.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Putin says Russia can supply EU via Nord Stream 2 - The Indian Express
articles.description: Vladmir Putin said it was possible to repair the pipelines but that Russia and Europe should decide their fate.
articles.content: President Vladimir Putin said on Wednesday that Russian gas could still be supplied to Europe through one remaining intact part of the Nord Stream 2 pipeline but the ball was now in the EU’s court on… [+834 chars]
